description_en: A family relationship between persons linked through marraige or adoption.
A family relationship between persons linked through descent from a common ancestor.
A relationship between persons related as members of a domestic group, or a number of domestic groups linked through descent from a common ancestor, marriage, or adoption
A biological family relationship between persons whoe are not linked through a direct line of descent.
A biological family relationship between persons linked through a direct line of descent.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier cousin.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier niece or nephew.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier aunt or uncle.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier maternal cousin.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier paternal cousin.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier paternal niece or nephew.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier maternal niece or nephew.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier paternal aunt or uncle.
A collateral family relationship of a person to thier maternal aunt or uncle.
A lineal family relationship between two persons with at least one shared parent.
A lineal family relationship from a person to their biological great grandparent.
A lineal family relationship from a person to their biological parent.
A lineal family relationship from a person and their descendent who is more than three generations removed (e.g. subsequent to a great grandchild)
A lineal family relationship from a person and an ancestor who is more than three generations removed (e.g. preceding a great grandparent)
A lineal family relationship from a person to their biological grandparent.
A lineal family relationship from a person and their biological grandchild.
A lineal family relationship from a parent to their biological offspring.
A lineal family relationship from a person and their biological great grandchild.
A sibling relationship between twins.
A sibling relationship between paternal twins.
A sibling relationship between fraternal twins.
